title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: At first I thought is power than anything, later on I said it's should be economic resources, then I realizes is money. I will give a brief poem here! The breeze blew and stake moistures and when it blew hales, it was just the breeze moving while the moistures is running away with fears. The mist of human fears is control by what is next to their breath. Money has power than anything, money makes one feels secure, alive and superior. When money leaves we felt life is gone, we feel dead, we feel empty, we feel hopeless.Currently my country government has turn humans to museum, moving without no direction, helpless and monuments because for over 3 months now the government has seized to release money in circulation, banks refused to fix money in ATM's, no canter payment. Everyone is helpless, no money no good food, no transportation, no job, no love, no smiles, no good health. Money drives away every feelings that makes life better. Money is truly powerful

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 09, 2023, 10:44:49 PMMoney drives away every feelings that makes life better. Money is truly powerfulIt truly is powerful and that's why even decent people make them indecent just to fulfill their desires and mostly, the major reason is to fulfill their needs. They've got no option as they say and that's the quickest way to satisfy and fill in their needs that need to be done. The world is rotating with money these days, with every step that we do, there goes money ready to be spent the entire world's economy is requiring money and that's why every single each of us needs to do our part in providing not just for ourselves but also in our family. But, don't let money take over you. Money becomes good if it's used for good purposes and becomes bad when the opposite is being done for a purpose.

comments.author: Bestdss
comments.body: Money rules the world because a man who is a billionaire is respected and loved by everyone. Why? Because he has the superpower to control everything from money whether a person or a thing. We can’t even think a man who has no money in his pocket can easily rule the world. That’s the reason the world is only ruling by those who have money to do all the things that they want which is although a darker side of our lives.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Well, the world we live in is based on a system where we use money to exchange goods and services. It's been like this for a long time and it's just the way things work. Money is a tool that allows us to trade things we have for things we need or want. But, there's a bit more to it than just that. The people who have more money have more power and influence in the world. For example, they can use their money to influence politicians or laws to benefit their interests. This can create inequality and unfairness in society. The people who have less money may not have access to the same opportunities and resources as those who are wealthy. So, in a way, money rules the world because it's a tool that people use to get what they want and need.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Historical destinies willed that whoever controls the world is the one who controls the mechanisms of circulation, since the world is not unified and each group uses its own methods. Money is the perfect tool for those whose hobby is imposing their control over the world and its capabilities.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: Money is really powerful, it makes people succumb to the person who has lots of it.  Many are willing to change their way to have it while others even put their life in danger just to earn it.  Money even changes a person and often make him betray others just to have this called money.  Money can mold the economy, make a country powerful, and can even get allies in securing dominance.  It can also corrupt people, making them a puppet and do what their master tell them to do in exchange of money as a reward.Money rules the world because money can buy almost anything in this world.  It is essential for survival and global dominance.

comments.author: Iroh
comments.body: I wouldn’t necessarily say that money is ruling the world cause in my opinion, it’s not. Admittedly, money is very important as we need money to purchase whatever we want whenever we want it. Personally, I think we indirectly and directly give more and more power to money with our love and pursuit for money. There are people who are willing to do unimaginable things hence selling their conscience and their soul for money. These are the people that let money rule and control them. Thankfully there are still people who wouldn’t dance to the sweet sweet tunes of money no matter how skilled the player is. Money would rule the world if only we allow it.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: If everything has a price, power literally means nothing, and will always be overshadowed by money. Money is ruling the world simply because it is what runs the lives of all people. You need money to live, and if it isn't the case, other things out there would rule the world and would be most important to a lot of people (power? control? who knows). The more money you have, the more power you have over people. You can do this because they believe you'll give them money if you tell them to do something, and if not, they'll simply just won't deal with you at all.

comments.author: Tazzy4050
comments.body: Today, money rules the world. Money is the force behind almost all corporate (and some state) activity and appears to be the primary reason for our economic decline.Money is ruling the world, because society has evolved around money and people have a very strong relationship with it. Money brings more opportunities to people who possess it and have an easier time doing things that they like doing. Money is also a medium of exchange and can be given as gifts in business meetings, even if it was not planned.Money is the reason why we are ruled by the world today. Money is not a creation of God, but it is what has become our main source of income and life. It is no longer something that we need to earn or live off of; people use it to fill their pockets with items they cannot afford and then try to hold people in line by telling them that they need to work hard for that money in order to get ahead. The sooner this is remedied, the better off the human race will be!Since the dawn of history, humans have relied on money to trade, purchase and sell their wares. Today, nations around the globe produce and conduct business in currencies that have evolved over time - from cowrie shells and seashells to silver bars, bullion coins and paper notes. The global economy relies heavily on printed money to facilitate commerce between individuals or businesses.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: Unfortunately, yeah, money is indeed ruling the world. It's sad but it's the reality. To a certain extent, romantic old lines like "money can't buy you love" or "money can't make you happy" are proven wrong. Although I don't believe that love can only be felt with money or that happiness can only be achieved with money, money can indeed get you the love of your life and it can indeed make you happy.There are ways to somehow minimize your dependence on money, though. I have been to communities where daily lives do not revolve around money.

comments.author: browsiek
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 09, 2023, 10:44:49 PMMoney drives away every feelings that makes life better. Money is truly powerfulmoney is the biggest influence in life, all need money to eat, buy clothes, vehicles, etc.  The suicide rate is dominated because of financial depression, every problem can be solved with money because money can change everything.

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: The poem is very deep, but it is true because without money we have nothing, even though we can live like in the forest and rely on food there, but it is difficult. That's how it is without it: we can't eat, we can't purchase our needs. Even though we just came out to the world, we really rely on money to buy necessities. Also, the sad truth is that using money, they can be powerful; they can give money to evade laws and even control people.

Nigerians are faced with inflation, increase in petroleum price, lack of fiat, and insecurity. People now have to buy the Naira as if they are buying another foreign currency. Economic activities have been negatively affected because most businesses and some customers don't have access to fiat. The most annoying part of the situation is that the bank's online and mobile channels are not functioning properly. Sometimes it could take more than three days for a transfer to be confirmed. Some people are currently living close to hell during this period.

comments.author: Docnaster
comments.created_time: March 10, 2023, 12:26:14 PMLast edit: March 10, 2023, 12:36:26 PM by Docnaster
comments.body: Quote from: Iroh on March 09, 2023, 11:33:43 PMI wouldn’t necessarily say that money is ruling the world cause in my opinion, it’s not. I agree with your opinion that money doesn't necessarily rule the world to an extent and I said to an extent because there are still few million inhabitants of the earth who still prioritize their conscience, integrity, beliefs and values more than than the figures of money and those sets of people can be excused from the notion that money is ruling the world and I would say they only make 5% of world population.That being said, it doesn't change the fact that money is ruling the world because the remaining 95% of world population can be influenced with money. The phrase that "money can not buy everything" I think was phrased by a rich man who wanted to give poor people genuine reasons to remain poor. Money can buy almost everything in the world and the very few things money can not buy, money will facilitate the means to get them thereby making money the sole facilitator of everything in the world.  That is why it is safe to say that money is ruling the world.

comments.body: Why money??Because money is the only thing that is used everywhere as a transfer of value. That's the simplest answer to this question. comments.body: people are greedy, power is what moves people. Money is a tool for those means. Why work on yourself if a million of $ can make you important? Feeling important is what moves them.
